subject: Sony Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams advanced to the final of the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., by drubbing Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-0, 6-3. Williams, ranked No. 1, will play Maria Sharapova for the title.
